data.persona: I am a parishioner of the church in the village.  The bishop speaks at the church once a week.  I go to the church to pray several times a week.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The stained glass glistens in the sun. The pews are lines perfectly.
There's two pews, a Alter, two stained glass, and a candle here.
The clergyman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take away the stained glass
data.mid_motivation: I plan to sell the stained glass at the market today
data.long_motivation: I hope to use the money to survive the coming winter
